ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to improve the Canadian Border Service Agencyâ€™s inventory management by allowing removal orders to be more easily enforced and to reduce the administrative burden place on officers abroad when they receive an application for a visa, Electronic Travel Authorization or authorization to return to Canada from a foreign national who is subject to an unenforced removal order.
